casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Timothy Wayne SPEIGHT. No. 491PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC. Margaret Creasy Ciardella, Hampstead, for Speight.

Defendant's Motion to File Supplemental Response on the Question of Special Verdicts is allowed. The Attorney General shall have seven days from the date of this Order to file a response, which shall not exceed five pages in length.

By order of this Court in Conference, this the 20th day of October, 2006.
